definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The Diviner Lunar Radiometer Experiment will map surface temperature.
sentences.chinese: 月球探測輻射計實驗將映射月球表面的溫度。

sentences.english: We have constructed a dual-channel microwave radiometer and conducted observation experiments in Hebei and Shanxi provinces.
sentences.chinese: 研製了雙通道微波輻射計，進行遙感實驗。

sentences.english: Synthetic aperture microwave radiometer represents a new technology being developed for passive microwave remote sensing.
sentences.chinese: 綜合孔徑微波輻射計是被動微波遙感發展的新方向。
